alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 8:51AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bertie, southeastern Northampton, Hertford, Gates and northwestern Chowan Counties through 930 AM EST... At 851 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Woodland to near Tarboro. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aulander around 855 AM EST. Ahoskie and Cofield around 900 AM EST. Winton around 905 AM EST. Gatesville, Lewiston Woodville and Roduco around 910 AM EST. Corapeake around 920 AM EST. Powellsville around 925 AM EST. Colerain and Harrellsville around 930 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Goose Pond, Eagletown, Whites Crossroads, Tunis, Gliden, Kelford, Earleys, Menola, Newsome Store and Savage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for northeastern North Carolina.
